1.0.0.name: wordpress/google-news-for-widget
1.0.0.description:
Simple Google News Widget. Admin can set different kind of news categories in widget and show news by category.

Features: * You can show as many as news by categories in your site's widget areas * You have options to select news by Region and Categories. * Easy to use not much configuration required.

List of my WordPress Plugins:

  • HP - Picasa Web Album Photos
  • Generate Social Network Profie QR Code.
  • YouTube Video Plugin to show YouTube Videos from widgets.
  • HP - Picasa Web Album Photos
  • Hardik - My RSS Plugin
  • Vis
